languages.text: {n}Вы не слышите ни шагов, ни шороха одежды, ни скрипа клинков.{/n}
{n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы не слышите ни шагов, ни шороха одежды, ни скрипа клинков.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous n'entendez ni bruits de pas, ni bruissement de vêtements, ni cliquetis de lames.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous n'entendez ni bruits de pas, ni bruissement de vêtements, ni cliquetis de lames.{/n}

languages.text: {n}足音も、衣擦れの音も、剣が触れ合う音さえも聞こえない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}足音も、衣擦れの音も、剣が触れ合う音さえも聞こえない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No oyes pasos, ni tampoco el crepitar de ropajes ni el tintineo de espadas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No oyes pasos, ni tampoco el crepitar de ropajes ni el tintineo de espadas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你没听到任何脚步声，也没听到衣服的沙沙声，或利刃叮当作响的声音。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你没听到任何脚步声，也没听到衣服的沙沙声，或利刃叮当作响的声音。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hiçbir ayak sesi, kıyafet hışırtısı veya metal şangırtısı duymuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiçbir ayak sesi, kıyafet hışırtısı veya metal şangırtısı duymuyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hörst weder Schritte, noch das Rascheln von Gewändern oder das Klirren von Klingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You hear no footsteps, no rustling of clothes, no clinking of blades.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst weder Schritte, noch das Rascheln von Gewändern oder das Klirren von Klingen.{/n}
